Basierend auf der durchschnittlichen Fil: Based on the average filtration performance of our water filters in use. The filter performance of our systems can be up to twice as high at the beginning of their life cycles. The figure is consciously calculated conservatively. In real operation the filter performance can be even higher than indicated.
Eine innovative Wasserfiltertechnologie: An innovative water filtration technology without need of electrical energy or chemicals, but with maximum purity.
